title: Where did the name "Minigue" come from?
text: Well, once in the testing phase he just talked of himself as "Minigeue", so we called him "Minigue" for easier spelling. 😎

title: What are you doing with my chat inputs?
text: Except for generating a response from MiniguePT - nothing. We have no idea what you are messaging the bot and we don't care either. 🤷‍♂️

title: What happens when I like/dislike a certain message?
text: The last few messages you exchanged with Minigue will be sent to our laboratories to improve the bot in the future! 🥼

title: How can I fix my Minigue if its replies are nonsensical?
text: It’s best to delete Minigues reply and your question and then ask again, worded differently. 😉

title: Why did my Minigue start rambling german things?
text: Like the creator, Minigues seems to be somewhat bilingual. If you keep using English, it’ll switch back quickly. 🇬🇧

title: Why is Minigues German bad, nothing he says makes sense?
text: Minigue is still new to German and chatting in English will make it easier for both of you. 🙃

title: Where can I find the source code?
text: The source code is available on GitHub. You can just click the Github button at the top right. 🤓

title: What about bugs I found and my great ideas?
text: Feel free to share everything that comes to your mind! We’d be very happy to hear about any suggestions. Feel free to create an issue directly in the repo or send us a message. 💌
